trans-unit.source: Specifies a description for a property or event.
trans-unit.target: Angir en beskrivelse for en egenskap eller hendelse.

trans-unit.source: A visual designer can display the specified description when referencing the component member, such as in a Properties window.
trans-unit.target: Visuelle utformeren kan vise den angitte beskrivelsen når refererer til medlemmet komponent som i Egenskaper-vinduet.

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute.Description%2A> to access the value of this attribute.
trans-unit.target: Kall <xref:System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute.Description%2A>til å få tilgang til dette attributtet.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se [attributter](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute"></xref> class with no parameters.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute"> </xref> klasse uten parametere.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute"></xref> class with a description.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute"> </xref> klassen med en beskrivelse.

trans-unit.source: The description text.
trans-unit.target: Beskrivelsesteksten.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the default value for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute"></xref>, which is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Angir verdien for den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute"> </xref>, som er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: This <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref> field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: Dette <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""> </xref> feltet er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets the description stored in this attribute.
trans-unit.target: Henter beskrivelsen som er lagret i dette attributtet.

trans-unit.source: The description stored in this attribute.
trans-unit.target: Beskrivelsen som er lagret i dette attributtet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string stored as the description.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir strengen som er lagret som beskrivelse.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute.Description%2A> property simply returns this value.
trans-unit.target: Standard implementering av den <xref:System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute.Description%2A>egenskapen returnerer ganske enkelt denne verdien.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: This extra property exists so that you can derive from <xref:System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute> and provide a localized version.
trans-unit.target: Ekstra egenskapen finnes slik at du kan utledes fra <xref:System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute>og angi en lokalisert versjon.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The derived localizable <xref:System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute> will maintain a private Boolean field to indicate if it has been localized.
trans-unit.target: Det avledede lokaliserbare <xref:System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute>opprettholder et private boolsk felt for å angi hvis den er lokalisert.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: On the first access to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute.Description%2A> property, it will look up the localized string and store it back in the DescriptionValue property.
trans-unit.target: På den første tilgangen til den <xref:System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute.Description%2A>egenskapen det slå opp den lokaliserte strengen og lagre den på egenskapen DescriptionValue.</xref:System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute.Description%2A>

trans-unit.source: The string stored as the description.
trans-unit.target: Strengen som er lagret som beskrivelse.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Returns whether the value of the given object is equal to the current <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer om verdien for det angitte objektet er lik gjeldende <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The object to test the value equality of.
trans-unit.target: Objektet for å teste verdien likheten mellom.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value of the given object is equal to that of the current; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis verdien for det angitte objektet er det samme som gjeldende; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer hashkoden for denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: En 32-biters heltall med fortegn hash-kode.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value indicating whether this is the default <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en verdi som angir om dette er standard <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if this is the default <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute"></xref> instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, hvis dette er standard <xref href="System.ComponentModel.DescriptionAttribute"> </xref> serverforekomsten; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
